mapper.update: update db_ywuser set USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'NAME' = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APITOKEN = #{apitoken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEVEL0 = #{level0,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'PASSWORD' = #{password,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SID, USERID, 'NAME', FLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, APITOKEN, LEVEL0, 'PASSWORD' from db_ywuser
